mapper.update:
update user_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cell_phone = #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email_code = #{emailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth_day = #{birthDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_insert = #{dateInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_update = #{dateUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email_code = #{emailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth_day = #{birthDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_insert = #{dateInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_update = #{dateUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
